show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 06 Michiel Lenstra, impact investing and small holder farmers
subtitle: 06 Michiel Lenstra, impact investing and small holder farmers
summary:
Investing in small holder farmers and regenerative agriculture.

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.

www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture. 

-----------------------------------------------------------

A conversation with Michiel Lenstra, Impact Investor and Lead Wire Investments at Wire Group with a passion for small holder farmers and regenerative agriculture. We covered a wide range of things in this interview, looking at the role of small holder farmers in the regenerative agriculture space and what impact investing can do there.

We also discussed the importance of land rights and a company we both invested in LandMapp/Meridia

Enjoy!

Notes and links:
www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2017/05/01/michiel-lenstra.
